name: Legend of Western Town-1942
description:
An accident in the desert ....
You came to a small town named 1942 ...
As you step into the town, a series of mysterious events ensue ... shaking signs, flashing neon lights, staring at the puppet you watch, following the footsteps behind you .... A seemingly supposed life I can not see a figure in this place.
There's always a pair of eyes in the darkness staring at you!
------------------------------------------------
  Mysterious scene
Wonderful puzzles
Think very terrifying plot let you put it down
If you think you have a strong heart, start this adventure
But be careful ... it's coming! ! !
